column4: hello! i just upgraded from 8.04 (all accents working GOOD) to 8.10 (my tilde stoped working) how can i fix this? i have an spanish keyboard, and i need: Ã£ and my keyboard does: ~a . i use fluxbox so i cant use the "key combine" from gnome
